ComicInfo.Summary:
First issue of the Judge Dredd Megazine (volume five) and the first issue (since 1992) to use the original numbering.
All new stories this issue except for the Thrill-Power Overload! article which continues from volume four (issue 18).
Three free gifts:
2000 AD Gold supplement 0012003 calendar/poster (art: Jock)Robert Harrop illustrated catalogue and order formJudge Dredd the Megazine 201
Cover: Cliff Robinson (Judge Dredd and Devlin Waugh)Judge Dredd - Phartz! (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra)Thrill-Power Overload! The History of the Galaxy's Greatest Comic (part 11) (David Bishop)The Kleggs! (Ian Edginton - Mike Collins)Judge Dredd - A Nativity Tale (illustrated text story) (Gordon Rennie - Adrian Salmon)Devlin Waugh - Red Tide (prologue) (John Smith - Colin Macneil)Devlin Waugh - Body and Soul (illustrated text story) (John Smith - Sean Phillips)Family (part 1) (Rob Williams - Simon Fraser)Thrill-Power Overload! Extra! The (Real) Mighty One! (David Bishop)The Interrogation Cube - Simon Fraser (interview)Judge Dredd - War Crimes (Gordon Rennie - Lee Sullivan)2000 AD Gold supplement 001
Cover: Carlos Ezquerra (Fiends of the Eastern Front)Introduction: Dan AbnettFiends of the Eastern Front (parts 1-10) (reprint from 2000ad progs 152-161) (Gerry Finley Day - Carlos Ezquerra)
